        public ServerRouterThread(java.lang.Object[][] table,
                          @NotNull
                          @NotNull java.net.Socket clientSocket,
                          int index)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Services each new connection to the ServerRouter
        Parameters:
        table - Object [String][Socket]
        clientSocket - socket to the client to be inserted into routing table
        index - the location to insert the client into the routing table
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • tableLookup

        private void tableLookup()
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Searches routing table for a record matching destinationIP. initializes input and output streams if lookup is successful
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • deliver

        private void deliver()
              throws java.io.IOException
        Reads from the fromClient input stream and sends data to the destination. if an ipv4 address is found in the stream, the routing table is searched and the matching socket becomes the new destination
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • service

        public void service()
             throws java.io.IOException
        Handles communication with a remote process
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • checkIPv4

        private static boolean checkIPv4(java.lang.String ip)
        Parameters:
        ip - String to be checked for IPv4 compliance
        Returns:
        returns true if ip is a string representation of a valid IPv4, returns false otherwise
